oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Mary Frances Ward
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: medicine; nursing; Visiting Nurse Association; Ward, Mary Frances; 1950s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Energetic Director -- Miss Mary Frances Ward is the driving force behind the Visiting Nurse Association. Working with her are Mrs. H. Duncan Taylor, president, and the members of the Junior League of Memphis, sponsoring agency, and William F. Murrah, president, and members of the VNA's Board of Directors."
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Memphis - Nurses and nursing - Visiting nurse association
